publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4980 Scott Barrie: ChildLine Scotlandâ€”That the Parliament congratulates ChildLine on its 20th birthday nationally and its 16 years in Scotland; supports the valuable counselling and outreach work which is offered so that children have a place to turn for advice and support; recognises that over the course of its 16 years ChildLine Scotland has counselled 370,700 children and advised around 15,000 adults; acknowledges that the service would not happen without the expertise and time commitment of more than 1,300 volunteers, and calls for people to support ChildLine in Scotland as it goes from strength to strength.
S2M-4980 ChildLine Scotland (lodged on 20 October 2006) Christine Grahame*, Marlyn Glen*, Kate Maclean*, Margaret Jamieson*

S2M-4980 ChildLine Scotland (lodged on 20 October 2006) Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Jackie Baillie*, Cathie Craigie*, Pauline McNeill*, Christine May*, Bill Butler*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Mr Charlie Gordon*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Robin Harper*, Tricia Marwick*, Eleanor Scott*, Fiona Hyslop*, Tommy Sheridan*, Rob Gibson*, Colin Fox*, Mike Pringle*, Karen Whitefield*, Carolyn Leckie*, Bruce Crawford*, Michael McMahon*, Patrick Harvie*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Trish Godman*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-4980 ChildLine Scotland (lodged on 20 October 2006) Mrs Nanette Milne*, Susan Deacon*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Rosie Kane*, Mr Jim Wallace*
S2M-4980 ChildLine Scotland (lodged on 20 October 2006) Ms Maureen Watt*, Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-4980 ChildLine Scotland (lodged on 20 October 2006) Shiona Baird*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4980 ChildLine Scotland (lodged on 20 October 2006) Cathy Peattie*
